attributes.action: jeremy clarkson should sacked for using N-word!
attributes.additional_details: We, the undersigned feel strongly enough about Mr Clarkson's use of the N-word especially on a public broadcasting platform. This is the latest in a catalogue of insults he has heaped on people who are not like him, more often than not on the BBC. He is a public figure and that comes with responsibilities. This should be the last straw!

rejection.details: This is a matter for the BBC.
